records.Name: Flow Demo - Multi-step Import Flow
records.Description__c: Recently I worked on a demo that involved building an Invokable Flow to process a set of data uploaded into a queue table (called Fileback). I doubt this exact use case will match perfectly for what your customers ask for, but if you'd like to see a flow in action that loops through a queue, and validates data against standard objects and updates the queue status accordingly, this may be the flow for you!
records.Source__c: Jonathan's Demo he built with Lori

records.Name: 1-feature platform demos contributors
records.Description__c: Chatter Group.  You're here because you're the kind of people who might 1) make demos 2) make variants of demos 3 ) make demo videos 4) give feedback on outlines & videos.

records.Name: Salesforce Architect Journey - Trailhead
records.Description__c:
Salesforce architect credentials comprise three tiers of certification that recognize specialized knowledge and skills, as well as your growing expertise in the Salesforce platform:
The Salesforce Architecture Designer credentials validate knowledge and expertise in particular specializations.
The Salesforce Application Architect and System Architect certifications recognize professionals who possess expertise in a domain area.
The Salesforce Technical Architect (CTA) credential is the pinnacle certification for those who demonstrate the knowledge, skills, and capabilities to design and build high-performance technical solutions on the Salesforce platform across all areas of domain expertise.

records.Name: LWC Playground in Quip
records.Description__c: This is a really cool feature in quip where you can show off LWC code in a quip document.

records.Name: Solutions Hub - Amer Commercial
records.Description__c: The AMER Commercial Solutions Hub is a collection of resources that we've curated to help you team better, grow your career, and stay updated with what's happening in our organization. As the most trusted, innovative, and engaged Solutions team, we inspire, transform, and ensure the success of our customers with high-value solutions. The resources in this Hub help us align our daily work to our Vision and Values. We hope that this will become your "go-to" resource for all things Commercial Solutions related. Thank you for visiting!

records.Name: Solutions Central
records.Description__c: *Solutions Central* (https://solutionscentral.io/) (formerly the Demo Center) is the global, central, content repository for Salesforce where you can find community-sourced content, industry and product content, demo tools and support, demo tips and tricks, design assets, and more. The content is primarily sourced by the Solutions Engineering org and was visited by over 16,000 employees in FY19.
